about.heading: Nothing is more original than nature
about.description:
Here you'll find jewelry, decorative items, souvenirs, and perhaps other random handmade products.
Each of them has a touch of nature that gives them their own unique character.

modal.recommendations: I would be grateful for recommendations and feedback.
